author: olwall
notes:
Easy KoG, a few thoughts:
1) Econ is the MVP, never run less than 3
2) I would run a third Cosmic Cyclone if I had it
3) Destiny Fusion can be situational but is great in those situations (removing alien counters, get rid of Wall of D Mons, etc)
4) You can't use celestial's effect in the grave if you just used Decider's effect to return a destiny hero to your hand - (and its the only destiny hero in your grave)
5) "control" destiny Heroes is a misnomer. It's more of a rush / Beatdown deck like Naturias than a 4* control deck
